description: GCD(d(n),d(n+1)) = 1, where d(n) is number of positive divisors of n.
example: 8 is included because d(8) = 4 is relatively prime to d(9) = 3.
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for(n=1, nn, if (gcd(numdiv(n), numdiv(n+1)) == 1, print1(n, ", ")));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 19 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_, Nov 11 2000
extensions: Offset changed to 1 by _Michel Marcus_, May 20 2014
